overview:
David is currently the Chief Operating Officer at Celtra Inc.. Celtra provides the most widely used mobile rich media platform and customers include the leading agencies, publishers, and mobile ad networks around the globe.

David is a Senior Executive with successful experience building and managing business operations including Business Development, Sales, Marketing, Corporate Development, Professional Services, Customer Support, and early and later stage companies domestically and internationally. Deep experience with digital media, social media, and cloud based solutions. Focus on scaling businesses with fiscal diligence. Experience acquiring/integrating companies after successful M&A transactions and developing partnerships leading to acquisition. Have lived/worked in Boston, NYC, San Francisco, and in various cities in Europe.

David received a B.S. in Business from the University of Rhode Island, attended Ealing College in London for International Business studies and has participated in executive education at Stanford University.
